tier.item: (13) a. Ich bleibe zu Hause. Ich bin krank.
What is the difference between English and Fijian complementation of verbs
I'm staying home. I am sick
`I am sick.' (verb in second position in clause)
(13) a. Ich bleibe zu Hause. Ich bin krank.
What is the difference between English and Fijian complementation of verbs
I'm staying home. I am sick
`I am sick.' (verb in second position in clause)
Ich bleibe zu Hause. Ich bin krank.
What is the difference between English and Fijian complementation of verbs
b. Ich bleibe zu Hause, weil ich krank bin. (18) au aa raica a omu lesu mai
I'm staying home because I sick am I Past see the your return here
`I'm staying home because I am sick.' `I saw that you returned here.'

(14) a. Sie kommt zu dir. Sie hat gegessen I Past hear the its winning
